pyfemtet.logger package

Module contents

pyfemtet.logger.get_dash_logger()[source]
pyfemtet.logger.get_dask_logger()[source]
pyfemtet.logger.get_module_logger(name, debug=False)[source]

Return the module-level logger.

The format is defined in the package_root_logger.

Parameters:

  • name (str) – The logger name to want.

  • debug (bool, optional) – Output DEBUG level message or not.

Returns:

The logger its name is root_package.subpackage.module. child level logger’s signal propagates to the parent logger and is shown in the parent(s)’s handler(s).

Return type:

logging.Logger
